paras: Our loyalty card, the CupLux Rewards Card, is built for customers that love our coffee and want to support our community philosophy. It's a very simple program: You get 10% back on all purchases of food or drink at CupLux to use on a future visit to our shop. The card is free and you can sign up the next time you come thru. The best part is, use the balance whenever you darn well please!
